item.title: RPCS3 Netplay (RPCN) Guide
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
RPCS3 Netplay (RPCN) Guide

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

Learn how to set up and use RPCS3 Netplay (RPCN). This guide covers global configuration, per-game settings, connectivity fixes, and RPCN account recovery.

Published on 2025-08-12 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-08-12

item.title: RPCS3 Installation and Configuration
item.author: axekinn@proton.me (Axekin)
item.description:
RPCS3 Installation and Configuration

Author: Axekin(axekinn@proton.me)

üéÆ Introduction to RPCS3

RPCS3 is the world’s most advanced open-source PlayStation 3 emulator. Written in C++, it uses a hybrid approach combining interpretation and recompilation to emulate the PS3’s Cell architecture. After years of development, it now offers impressive compatibility with over 60% of PS3 games.

‚ö†Ô∏è Legal Notice: This emulator is intended for playing only games you legally own. Emulation for backup and research purposes is legal, but piracy is not.

Published on 2025-06-02 at Wiki of Axekin, last modified on 2025-06-02
